metadata.title: CVE-2024-6685 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.7 prior to 17.1.7, 17.2 prior to 17.2.5, and 17.3 prior to 17.3.2,where group runners information was disclosed to unauthorised groupmembers.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
